title: Germinal center B-cell subgroups in the tumor microenvironment cannot be overlooked: their involvement in prognosis, immunotherapy response, and treatment resistance in head and neck squamous carcinoma
content:
Publication date: Available online 11 September 2024

Source: Heliyon

Author(s): Li Lin, Jiani Zou, Shengbin Pei, Wenyi Huang, Yichi Zhang, Zhijie Zhao, Yantao Ding, Can Xiao
